job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: stronguAbout NimblebrustrongNimble is a Series A startup founded from the AI labs at Stanford and Carnegie Mellon Were pioneering the way robots learn to grasp and manipulate any objectbrOur ultimate goal is to create the dark warehouse a fully automated eCommerce fulfillment center with swarms of intelligent cloudconnected robots to enable affordable sameday fulfillment for every retailer large and small In the process we aim to create one of the worlds most valuable robotics companiesbrWere backed by the worlds most prestigious investors as well as AI and robotics legends like FeiFei Li Chief Scientist of AI at Google Director of Stanfords AI lab and Sebastian Thrun founder of Google X Waymo Kitty Hawk and UdacitybrstronguAbout The RolebrustrongHelp us advance our robotics moonshot by designing building and supporting features that empower machine learning algorithms and robotic systems Youll create foundational scalable systems that extend horizontally throughout the stack You will design and architect solutions to complex software engineering challenges take ownership of projects and push deployments to productionbrYou will play a critical role in working with our worldclass crossfunctional team to architect and build the worlds most advanced robotic systems for the worlds biggest robotics opportunitybrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliDevelop largescale distributed systems and data processing systemsliliDevelop advanced algorithms to obtain optimal realtime performanceliliDesign APIs for testability scalability usability and maintainabilityliliDevelop and maintain massive data infrastructureliliProvide input on all aspects of product development from brainstorming to final deliveryliliWelcome new challenges and work independently across disciplines to both investigate issues and identify solutionsbrliulstronguQualificationsbrustrongulliFast learner Aplayer great work ethic and ambitiousliliBSMSPhD in Computer Science Mathematics Electrical Engineering or a related discipline or equivalent experienceliliStrong experience writing production code in Python and Clili3 FrameworksbrliulstronguBenefitsbrustrongComprehensive medical dental and vision insurance Paid holidays generous PTO competitive wages and meaningful equity of NimblebrstronguCulturebrustrongWe embrace challenges and strive to make the impossible possible each day Were not in this to do whats easy or to be mediocre We want to create something legendary and leave our mark on the world Were ambitious were gritty were humble and were relentlessly resourceful in pursuit of our goals If this sounds like you then you might be a great  Opportunity EmployerbrustrongWe are an equal opportunity
